remarks: If two structures have the same group components (properties), they have the same group inversion function.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 27-Nov-2014.)  (Revised by Stefan O'Rear, 21-Mar-2015.)
statement:
grpinvpropd.1 $e |- ( ph -> B = ( Base ` K ) ) $.
grpinvpropd.2 $e |- ( ph -> B = ( Base ` L ) ) $.
grpinvpropd.3 $e |- ( ( ph /\ ( x e. B /\ y e. B ) ) -> ( x ( +g ` K ) y ) = ( x ( +g ` L ) y ) ) $.
grpinvpropd $p |- ( ph -> ( invg ` K ) = ( invg ` L ) ) $.
$d B x y $.
$d K x y $.
$d L x y $.
$d ph x y $.
